Literature.Title: Structure-Activity Study of an All-d Antimicrobial Octapeptide D2D.
Literature.Author: Lone A, Thomsen TT, Nielsen JE, Thulstrup PW, Klitgaard RN, Lobner-Olesen A, Lund R, Jenssen H, Hansen PR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=4µg/ml)
